duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all Bill of Materials (BOMs) and enter information correctly into PLM
Manage Confirm samples/PP and TOP samples and CS/PP/TOP library
Create full style tech packs with all details including fillers, collars, and stitch per inch
Attend turn-in meetings to ensure all factory allocation is clear and revisions are needed
Keep tech library up to date for all team members to access for counter sample
Create a library & competitive knowledge of all sub materials/components for bags
Manage a time and action calendar in collaboration with design & production for on-time delivery
Help set up for design meetings and update boards, moving boards and samples into showrooms
Correspond with Asian Factories on a daily basis
